00001 #include "environment.hpp"

00004 //Environment Class
00005 //Based on Aerocalc: http://www.kilohotel.com/python/aerocalc/
00006 //Valid up to 11km
00008 
00010         //Constructor
00011         environmentModel::environmentModel()
00012         {
00013                 int i;
00014 
00015                 grav0 = last_letter_msgs::Geoid::EARTH_grav;
00016                 if(!ros::param::getCached("simRate", simRate)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/simRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00017                 dt = 1.0/simRate;
00018                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/Dryden/use", allowTurbulence)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/Dryden/use- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00019 
00020                 //initialize atmosphere stuff
00021                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/groundTemp", T0)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/groundTemp- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00022                 T0 += 274.15;
00023                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/groundPres", P0)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/groundPres- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00024 
00025                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/rho", Rho0)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/rho- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00026 
00027                 //Initialize bias wind engine
00028                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/windRef", windRef)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/windRef- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00029                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/windRefAlt", windRefAlt)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/windRefAlt- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00030                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/windDir", windDir)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/windDir- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00031                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/surfSmooth", surfSmooth)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/surfSmooth- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00032                 windDir = windDir*M_PI/180; //convert to rad
00033                 kwind = windRef/pow(windRefAlt,surfSmooth);
00034                 //Initialize turbulence engine
00035                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/Dryden/Lu", Lu)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/Dryden/Lu- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00036                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/Dryden/Lw", Lw)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/Dryden/Lw- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00037                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/Dryden/sigmau", sigmau)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/Dryden/sigmau- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00038                 if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/Dryden/sigmaw", sigmaw)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/Dryden/sigmaw- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00039                 windDistU = 0;
00040                 for (i=0;i<2;i++)
00041                 {
00042                         windDistV[i] = 0;
00043                         windDistW[i] = 0;
00044                 }
00045 
00046 
00047         }
00048 
00050         //Read input states and publish environment data
00051         void environmentModel::callback(const last_letter_msgs::SimStates::ConstPtr& InpStates)
00052         {
00053                 //if (firstcall)
00054                 //      dt=1.0/simRate;
00055 
00056                 states = *InpStates;
00057                 calcTemp(); //Run 1st
00058                 calcGrav();
00059                 calcWind();
00060                 calcDens();
00061                 calcPres();
00062                 calcGrav();
00063                 environment.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00064                 env_pub.publish(environment);
00065                 dt = (ros::Time::now() - tprev).toSec();
00066                 tprev = ros::Time::now();
00067 
00068         }
00069 
00071         //Calculate wind element in body axes
00072         void environmentModel::calcWind()
00073         {
00074                 double Reb[9];
00075                 geometry_msgs::Vector3 airspeed;
00076                 double Va, input, temp[2];
00077 
00078                 if (dt > 2/simRate)
00079                 {
00080                         dt = 2/simRate;
00081                 } //Compensate for possible transient frame drops
00082 
00083                 //calculate bias wind
00084                 quat2rotmtx(states.pose.orientation, Reb);
00085                 wind.x = -cos(windDir)*kwind*pow(abs(states.geoid.altitude)+0.001,surfSmooth);
00086                 wind.y = -sin(windDir)*kwind*pow(abs(states.geoid.altitude)+0.001,surfSmooth); //abs is used to avoid exp(x,0) which may return nan
00087                 wind.z = 0;
00088 
00089                 if (isnan(wind.x) || isnan(wind.y) || isnan(wind.z))
00090                 {
00091                         ROS_FATAL("earth wind NAN in environmentNode!");
00092                         cout << wind.x << " " << wind.y << " " << wind.z << endl;
00093                         ros::shutdown();
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 //calculate turbulent wind
00097                 airspeed = Reb*states.velocity.linear;
00098                 airspeed = airspeed - wind;
00099                 Va = sqrt(pow(airspeed.x,2)+pow(airspeed.y,2)+pow(airspeed.z,2));
00100 
00101                 if (allowTurbulence)
00102                 {
00103                         input = (((double)rand()) / (RAND_MAX) - 0.5); //turbulence u-component
00104 
00105                         windDistU = windDistU*(1-Va/Lu*dt) + sigmau*sqrt(2*Va/(M_PI*Lu))*dt*input;
00106 
00107                         input = (((double)rand()) / (RAND_MAX) - 0.5); //turbulence v-component
00108                         temp[0] = windDistV[0];
00109                         temp[1] = windDistV[1];
00110                         windDistV[1] = -pow(Va/Lu,2)*dt*temp[0] + temp[1] + sigmau*sqrt(3*Va/(M_PI*Lu))*Va/(sqrt(3)*Lu)*dt*input;
00111                         windDistV[0] = (1.0-2.0*Va/Lu*dt)*temp[0] + dt*temp[1] + sigmau*sqrt(3*Va/(M_PI*Lu))*dt*input;
00112 
00113                         input = ((double)rand() / (RAND_MAX) - 0.5); //turbulence w-component
00114                         temp[0] = windDistW[0];
00115                         temp[1] = windDistW[1];
00116                         windDistW[1] = -pow(Va/Lw,2)*dt*temp[0] + temp[1] + sigmaw*sqrt(3*Va/(M_PI*Lw))*Va/(sqrt(3)*Lw)*dt*input;
00117                         windDistW[0] = (1.0-2.0*Va/Lw*dt)*temp[0] + dt*temp[1] + sigmaw*sqrt(3*Va/(M_PI*Lw))*dt*input;
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 if (isnan(windDistU) || isnan(windDistV[0]) || isnan(windDistW[0]))
00121                 {
00122                         ROS_FATAL("turbulence NAN in environmentNode!");
00123                         cout << windDistU << " " << windDistV[0] << " " << windDistW[0] << endl;
00124                         ros::shutdown();
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 environment.wind = Reb/wind; //Rotate bias wind in body axes
00128 
00129                 environment.wind.x +=windDistU; //Add turbulence
00130                 environment.wind.y +=windDistV[0];
00131                 environment.wind.z +=windDistW[0];
00132 
00133                 if (isnan(environment.wind.x) || isnan(environment.wind.y) || isnan(environment.wind.z))
00134                 {
00135                         ROS_FATAL("body wind NAN in environmentNode!");
00136                         cout << environment.wind.x << " " << environment.wind.y << " " << environment.wind.z << endl;
00137                         ros::shutdown();
00138                 }
00139         }
00140 
00142         //Calculate air density
00143         void environmentModel::calcDens()
00144         {
00145                 double Hb = 0, Tb = T0, Pb = P0, L = L0;
00146                 double alt2pressRatio = (Pb / P0) * pow(1 - (L / Tb) * (states.geoid.altitude/1000.0 - Hb), ((1000.0 * grav0) / (Rd * L))); //Corrected to 1 - (L/...)
00147                 double alt2tempRatio =  environment.temperature / T0;
00148                 double density = Rho0 * alt2pressRatio  / alt2tempRatio;
00149                 environment.density = density;
00150         }
00151 
00153         //Calculate barometric pressure
00154         void environmentModel::calcPres()
00155         {
00156                 double pressure;
00157                 double Hb = 0, Tb = T0, Pb = P0, L = L0;
00158                 pressure = Pb * pow(1 - (L / Tb) * (states.geoid.altitude/1000.0 - Hb), ((1000.0 * grav0) / (Rd * L))); //Corrected to 1 - (L/...)
00159                 environment.pressure = pressure;
00160         }
00161 
00163         //Calculate temperature
00164         void environmentModel::calcTemp()
00165         {
00166                 environment.temperature = T0 + states.geoid.altitude/1000.0 * L0;
00167         }
00168 
00170         //Calculate gravity
00171         void environmentModel::calcGrav()
00172         {
00173                 double slat2 = pow(sin(M_PI/180*states.geoid.latitude),2);
00174                 double Re2 = pow(last_letter_msgs::Geoid::WGS84_Ra,2);
00175 
00176                 grav0 = last_letter_msgs::Geoid::EARTH_grav * (1.0+0.00193185138639 * slat2) / sqrt(1.0-0.00669437999013 *slat2);
00177                 double gravity = grav0 * (1.0 - grav_temp * states.geoid.altitude + 3.0 *(pow(states.geoid.altitude,2)/Re2) );
00178                 environment.gravity = gravity;
00179         }
00180

00184 //Main function
00186 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00187 {
00188 
00189         ros::init(argc, argv, "environmentNode");
00190         ros::NodeHandle n;
00191 
00192         environmentModel env;
00193 
00194         ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("states",1,&environmentModel::callback, &env);
00195         env.env_pub = n.advertise<last_letter_msgs::Environment>("environment",1);
00196 
00197         ros::Duration(3).sleep(); //wait for other nodes to get raised
00198         //double simRate;
00199         //ros::param::get("sim ",simRate); //frame rate in Hz
00200         //ros::Rate spinner(simRate);
00201 
00202         ROS_INFO("environmentNode up");
00203         env.tprev = ros::Time::now();
00204         ros::spin();
00205 
00206         return 0;
00207 
00208 }
